get.description: Get CURVES data based on HAAT and curve type. If two of the three data points (e.g., field strength, power, and distance) are provided, the third will be calculated. Response returned in JSON format.

parameters.name: computationMethod
parameters.label: Computation Method
parameters.description:
Specifies the input/output combination.

1: Calculate distance from field strength and power (default)
2: Calculate field strength from distance and power
3: Calculate max power from field strength and distance

parameters.name: serviceType
parameters.label: Service Type
parameters.description:
Type of broadcast service.

Valid values: tv or fm

parameters.name: haat
parameters.label: HAAT
parameters.description:
Height Above Average Terrain

Values must be between 30-1600 meters.
If the value passed is less than 30,
the code will use the value 30 instead.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.label: Channel
parameters.description:
Required for TV not for FM.
Any value passed for FM will be reset to 6 since channel 6 is the only valid channel for FM services.

parameters.name: field
parameters.label: field
parameters.description: Field strength data point (e.g. 28 dBu). At least two data points are required (see computation method).

parameters.name: erp
parameters.label: ERP (kW)
parameters.description: Effective Radiation Power (kW) data point. At least two data points are required (see computation method).

parameters.name: distance
parameters.label: Distance (m)
parameters.description: Distance (m) data point. At least two data points are required (see computation method).

parameters.name: curve
parameters.label: Curve
parameters.description:
Type of propagation curve, range is 0-2.

0: use F(50, 50) curve

1: use F(50, 10) curve

2: use F(50, 90) curve

parameters.name: format
parameters.description:
Format for the returned results.

Defaults to json.
